entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 32 except low minus 40 near the Ogilvie mountains.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Temperature steady near minus 32 except low minus 40 near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending after midnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 4 cm near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
